name: Storm Blast

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.
Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity; reduces incoming healing and barrier application by 70% per stack; damage is reduced by agony resistance.

description: A swirling vortex applies agony, weakness, and chill.
